quote: We were immortal, did you know that? Did you feel it like me? We had the world at our feet and we were going to live forever. Then came life – growing inside you – and I became mortal.
quote_letters: WE WERE IMMORTAL DID YOU KNOW THAT DID YOU FEEL IT LIKE ME WE HAD THE WORLD AT OUR FEET AND WE WERE GOING TO LIVE FOREVER THEN CAME LIFE - GROWING INSIDE YOU - AND I BECAME MORTAL
